ygData.subject: OOC: Character histories
ygData.msgSnippet: If anyone wants a history with another character that they do not own please talk with the owner of that character. If it is an NPC then please talk with me.

If anyone wants a history with another character that they do not own
please talk with the owner of that character. If it is an NPC then
please talk with me. Please do not assume that a character you have
has worked with another character or has been friends or enemies of a
certain character without discussing it first, its only fairt here
could be factors that you as a player are unaware of.

I have modified the histories of some of the characters from what they
were in the cartoon to merge the competing continuities together. Some
things do not easily fit together and so require me to get creative
and also Most the time I will probrably say yes, but there will be
sometimes I will have to say no and the same with other people as
well.

Anyways,
Game on!

- Preston
